text: [Music]
[Music]
hello
i am vishwa a cloud support engineer
here at the aws
office in dallas today i'm going to show
you
how to troubleshoot the issue where your
amazon emr cluster fails to start with
the error
bootstrap action returned a non-zero
return code
let's get started bootstrap actions
run after amazon emr provisions the
amazon ec2 instances in the cluster
if a bootstrap action fails because of
an error in the bootstrap script
then the cluster can't launch to
determine why
a bootstrap action failed from the aws
management console
go to your amazon emr console and then
open the cluster summary page
find the clustered logs under log uri
field
choose the folder icon here review the
standard error logs for bootstrap action
on the instance
where the bootstrap script failed under
the path s3
your logs bucket and then the emr
cluster id
node and then instance id and then
bootstrap actions
if you can't determine why the script
failed after reviewing the standard
error logs modify your script to provide
additional debug information
thanks for watching and happy cloud
computing from all of us here at aws
